item.description: Please join us on Tuesday night June 2nd for a Scrapbook Class held at the Saddle Rock Apartment Complex Clubhouse. Each participant will have ample table space to work on their layout. Participate in the class project or come and do your own thing! Memory Works products will be available and catalog orders will be accepted! There will be a tool table available for use during the class (Cricut, Crop-a-dile, Corner Chomper etc.). Please RSVP to Jodi at jocahill@optonline.net or call 631-379-8028! The more the merrier, bring a friend!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there to greet you at the door!
item.name: Scrapbook Classes June Meetup
